1 ^ Ad te levávi òculos meos: 2 ^ Ecče sicut òculi servórum in mánibus dominórum suórum~; sicut òculi ančìllaĕ in mánibus dòminaĕ suaĕ
qŭi hábitas in čaĕlîs. ^ To thee have I: ita òculi nostri ad Dòminum Deum nostrum
donec misereátur nostri. ^ Behold as the eyes of servants are on the hands of their masters~; as the eyes of the handmaid are on the hands of her mistress
column4: so are our eyes unto the Lord our God
column5: until he have mercy on us.

column4: qŭia mùltum repléti sùmus despecțióne. ^ Have mercy on us
column7: for we are greatly filled with contempt.

1 ^ Ad te levávi òculos meos: 4 ^ Qŭia mùltum repléta est ánima nostra~; oppróbrium abundántibus
qŭi hábitas in čaĕlîs. ^ To thee have I: et despècțio supèrbîs. ^ For our soul is greatly filled~; we are a reproach to the rich
